EmailTemplate.name: 2. >15 TT && >0.225 FT -> Normal levels
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Optimale Blood Test Result
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{{Blood_Test__c.Contact_Name__c}}},
Your blood results are back from the lab and show normal levels of total and free testosterone.
You can access your blood test results below:
View Results < {{{Blood_Test__c.PDF_URL__c}}} >
The password is: {{{Blood_Test__c.PDF_Password__c}}}
These levels are not currently low enough for testostereone replacement therapy.
However, if you have symptoms of low testosterone, there are three options that may be suitable:
- Re-test in 6 weeks. Testosterone levels do fluctuate, so it may be helpful to re-test in a few weeks' time. You can buy a new testing kit here < https://www.optimale.co.uk/product/testosterone-blood-test/ > . - If you are experiencing Erectile Dysfunction then we recommend exploring Manual's range of Erectile Dysfunction treatment here < https://www.manual.co/erectile-dysfunction?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=trt_not_low > . Prices start from Â£1.67 per pill. - Try to increase your testosterone levels without TRT. See Manual's "Testosterone support" daily supplements here < https://www.manual.co/daily-health/testosterone?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=trt_not_low > .
If you have any questions at all about your results please let us know.
Many thanks,
Optimale
Optimale Ltd, 71-75 Shelton Street, London, WC2H 9JQ, United Kingdom
